channel.title: Store on Fronkon Games
channel.description: Recent content in Store on Fronkon Games

item.title: Sprites Mojo
item.description: assets used in video and demo are not included STORE      DEMO   Editor   From the editor you can create ‘Sprites Mojo’ effects in two different ways: creating sprites and creating materials.

item.title: LUTs
item.description: Thanks to LUTs you can completely transform the look of your games, making them more coherent with your artistic preferences.

item.title: Glitches
item.description: ‘Glitches’ contains the following assets: Color Blindness, simulates the most common vision defects. Corrupt Memory, a cyber attack? no, it’s just corrupted memory.

item.title: Camera Transitions
item.description: assets used in video and demo are not included STORE      DEMO   This asset provides a collection of cinematic, realtime and easy-to-use camera transition effects to enhance your games.

item.title: Retro
item.description: ‘Retro’ is a great collection of retro effects, simple to use and with many configuration options. It consists of the following effects:

item.title: Spice Up
item.description: ‘Spice Up’ is a large selection of effects to give juice to your FPS / VR games. It consists of the following effects:

item.title: Artistic
item.description: All the effects of ‘Artistic’ will help you to achieve a unique look for your games. It consists of the following effects:

item.title: True Ballistics
item.description: assets used in video and demo are not included A comprehensive, physically-accurate ballistics simulation system for Unity that provides realistic trajectories, ricochets, penetration mechanics, and advanced ballistic effects for games requiring authentic projectile behavior.
